info.description: AdditionalServices allows you to fetch or update the internal username of the new hires after the hiring process is completed.

post.summary: API for updating the username of the onboarding new hire.
post.description: This API allows you to update the internal username of new hires with the username that is generated.

get.summary: API for fetching the username of the  onboarding new hire (from Manage Pending Hire page).
get.description: This API allows you to get the username of the onboarding new hire, after the new hire has gone through the Manage Pending Hires process. This is applicable to the newly hired employees whose joining date is in the future.
